snippet: With a presidential election year approaching, and control of Congress also at stake, the current negotiations represent one of the few opportunities in the near future to pass sweeping legislation.
abstract: Lawmakers, lobbyists and interest groups rush to cram riders into looming legislative deal that would combine $1.1 billion spending bill and $750 billion in tax breaks, averting government shutdown; provisions are leading to intense debate.
lead_paragraph: With a presidential election year approaching, and control of Congress also at stake, the current negotiations represent one of the few opportunities in the near future to pass sweeping legislation.

headline.main: Lawmakers Rush to Cram Pet Projects Into Spending Deal Ahead of New Deadline
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Rush to Cram Pet Projects Into Spending Deal Ahead of New Deadline

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget
